description: A tooltip can be hooked to the top, bottom, left or right of an element.  However, in order to actually display the element properly, you will need to write code to absolutely position the tooltip in the correct location.  In order to do taht, you just need to add the tooltip to the DOM (I recommend at the bottom) and then set the top and left position of the tooltip to the appropriate values and trigger the displaying the tooltip on hover.
